Transcript: Alexandra: So, you want to question me, frank?

Frank: No, alex. I just want to talk to you. Okay? Tie up some loose ends. 
You have no reason to panic, here.

Alexandra: Well, what's the reason... really no reason then to drag me 
downtown, is there?
Frank: There's nobody dragging you. Look, no cuffs.
Alexandra: Well, then it can wait, can't it?
Frank: Unfortunately, it can'T.

Frank: I'll tell you what, alex. Why don't you just go over there and say

Alexandra: Chief cooper wants to take me downtown for some questioning, and I

Tammy: (Sighs) oh, joey problems. I just needed someplace to think. What's

Harley: I'm picking out wedding rings, and I hate this. I mean, I want a nice

Harley: Sweetie, I find that very hard to believe, because you are just like

Tammy: The problem is, i don't want just any guy.

this wedding.
Edmund: Ladies-- and I do use that term loosely.

Lizzie: Well, I could use a handyman.

Michelle: Oh, yeah.

Michelle: Good, because i want to be wanted.

Michelle: Mm-hmm?

Michelle: You mean I'm not doing it right?
Danny: No, no, no, no. God, no.
Michelle: You mean it's not like before?
Danny: No. No, god, you are so sexy.

Michelle: Well, then what? What is it? And don't tell me it's you because I

Danny: No, I just... (sighs) I think this is... it's too much, too soon.

Michelle: I want you, okay? I do. I want to make love to you. Can't you see

hard. You know?
Michelle: Did I, like, used to just lay there and do nothing?

Michelle: Don't laugh at me.

Danny: Oh, michelle.
Michelle: There's no reason to wait.

Danny: Because. (Sighs) michelle, it feels like we're trying to make up for

Michelle: Is this, like, the chivalrous side of you?
Danny: No. It's the good husband side.

Michelle: Mm-hmm.
Danny: We okay?
Michelle: Yeah.

Michelle: Mm-hmm.
Danny: I'm hungry. (Laughs)

Gus: Just stay calm. Okay? That's all. You...

Alexandra: Easy for you to say, isn't it? Do you have any idea what frank is
